11112.content:
"Daniel. Come sit down." His dad asked him.

Danny walked over and took a seat across from his father.

"Look Danny, I don't have a lot of time so I'm going to make this short and easy." Danny's father said.

Danny sighed, readying himself for a scolding.

"Matt isn't like us." He said.

Danny's ears perked up.

"You both have it better than I did growing up but you remind me a lot of me, especially when I was younger. Your humor, your social skills. Matt...he reminds me of your mother, and there's nothing wrong with that. He's smart, nerdy, yeah... kind of a geek. But he's not a great communicator. Look, you both have your faults. I'm going to tell you something because I think you're at an age now where you can understand, but you have to keep it a secret between you and I, ok?" Danny's father asked.

Danny nodded.

"You're my favorite." He said flat out.

Danny started to smile. "Thanks, dad!"

"Don't thank me. Parent's aren't supposed to HAVE favorites." Danny's dad said. "But the truth is we all do, we just don't say anything. Like I said, you remind me so much of me growing up.... it's why I let you get away with a lot of things. But your brother, he's different. He's a shy boy, afraid of conflict. There's nothing wrong with that, even though I'd prefer he man up sometimes...but I still love him. Now...this whole pranking thing.... I'll be honest. One part of me wants to tell you to stop it, because you're being mean to your brother and he doesn't appreciate it. But the other part of me wants you to keep doing it...so maybe one day he'll learn to stand up for himself."

"So...I can keep pranking him?" Danny asked.

"How about we make a deal that I ignore it for now but you do your best to make sure he doesn't complain?"

"Deal!" Danny said happily. "I'll humiliate him so bad he'll have no chance but to stand up for himself!"

"That's my boy. But try not to get hurt. He might blow up one day."

"Pffthaha I'm not worried about it." Danny said confidently.

"Soooooo, Dad, since I'm your favorite can I have $20 dollars? I only need $20 to get the new Call of Duty game." Danny asked.

"I would champ, but I gave all my money to Matt for prom. You'll just have to wait." His dad said.

"Awwww, really? That sucks." Danny said, disappointed.

"Prom is important, and I'm proud of Matt for having someone to go with. I can't wait to meet her. I promise I'll get you the game as soon as I can."

"But dad my friends are already playing it!" Danny pouted.

"You'll just have to wait, son. Now get some clothes on and get ready for school."

"Okaaaaay." Danny whined.

Danny got up out of his seat and walked toward his room to get ready for school.

He got inside his room and shut his door for privacy.

"I can't believe I forgot you were in there..." Danny said, opening the front part of his underwear and reaching inside.

He pulled out a small, tiny voice recorder and grinned when he saw it was still on.

"I'm sure you caught a lot of my amazing farts earlier...but hopefully you also caught that whole 'favorite son' thing. I bet Matt would LOVE to hear that hahahahahahah!!" Danny laughed.

Danny got home from school later than usual after getting detention.

When he stepped in the door to his house his father was already waiting for him.

'Shit.' Danny thought. 'I didn't think he'd wait this long.'

"Why are you home later than usual?" His father asked.

"You know why..." Danny said with a bit of an attitude. "The principal said he called."

"That's not what I mean." His father told him. "Detention ended hours ago. It's 6 pm, Daniel."

"Well..after detention I went to the skate park...." Danny started.

"To avoid me?" His father asked.

Danny remain silent.

"What's this I heard about a laser pointer in class?" His father asked him sternly.

Danny finally closed the door behind him.

"Sorry Dad I--"

"Sorry doesn't cut it this time, Daniel. I heard HOW you used the laser pointer." His father said.

Danny snickered a little.

"This isn't funny. You were using it to point out a fellow classmate's boobs and ass?" His father asked.

"Dad it was Melissa and I was----"

"I don't care WHO it was. You got in BIG trouble. I don't want to hear about it."

"But dad, she even gave me her phone number after. I guess she thinks I'm pretty ho---"

"I don't CARE Daniel. That kind of prank will get you in REALLY big trouble with the wrong people. You're lucky the girl didn't mind or tell her parents." His father told him.

"But dad--"

"But nothing. Now you're grounded. And you can forget about the call of duty game."

Danny pouted.

"Fine." He said. "But you thought it was funny when I pranked Matt. You even said you would let me!"

"Don't blame this behavior on me, son. Of course pranking your brother is harmless, and YES I said I would turn a blind eye to that. But pranking a girl at school? Like that? At a time right now where boys and men can be falsely accused of any kind of wild behavior? You KNOW better." His dad said. "Now go to your room. You won't be leaving this house at all for the weekend. IF I hear any lip from you, I'll take away your computer."

"Oh and before you go..." His dad said. "I JUST finished making you boys dinner. SO you can take your plate to your room and give this one to your brother."

"What is it?" Danny asked with his nose up in disgust.

"I made noodles and some butternut squash with cheese."

"But dad that's gross!"

"I don't like it either, but your Aunt Debbie sent us a barrel load of squash. What ELSE can I do with it?!"

"Whatever." Danny said with a snarky attitude.

He grabbed the plates from his father's hands and walked off with them toward his room.

"Stupid Dad....stupid Aunt Debbie. Squash is gross. The fuck are you thinking?" Danny said, getting upset.

"And it leaves this gross yellow stain if it touches my hand. Fucking tastes terrible too. Only an idiot eats this shit." Danny said.

He expertly opened his door with two plates in his hands, making his way to the desk.
He sat both of the plates down on his desk and turned his computer on.

"You didn't even take away my computer...pussy." Danny muttered under his breath, still upset about his lecture.

The expensive gaming computer that his father bought him turned on in an instant and he opened up his youtube channel, pulling up the video he had uploaded before school.

"Whoa... 5 new comments?" Danny said, amazed the video was as popular as it was already. "I can't wait to read those!" He said, excited.

"Guess I'll save that for when I eat this shit." Danny said, looking down at the meal that awaited him. "At least then I'll be able to enjoy something." He continued talking to himself.

"Can't believe he's going to make me bring this plate to Matt. Can't he get his own fucking plate?" Danny asked himself, looking at his brother's food on the desk.

"Hmmm....." He pondered. "Hahaha oh my god I know what would make this awesome!!!" Danny said.

He leaned forward over the plate of cut butternut squash and penne noodles.

HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCCCCCCCCCCKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK KKKKKKKKKKKKKK

PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

Danny rummaged up all the phlegm he had in the back of his throat and drained mucus from his sinues, spitting out a wad of liquid bacteria into his brother's bowl of pasta.

"Hahah hope you enjoy THAT, Matt." He said, mixing his spit around on all the noodles with the fork in the bowl.

Satisfied with what he had done, Danny walked out of his room with his brother's plate and down the hallway toward his room.
He knocked a few times.

"Not now." His brother's voice said, sounding a bit annoyed.

"I have your dinner." Danny said.

"Oh, sorry, come in." Matt said.

Danny opened the door and entered the room and what he saw left him stunned.
His brother was skyping with someone -- a girl! And she looked like a total babe.

"What did dad make us this time?" Matt asked, looking at the plate he had in his hand. "Butternut squash pasta?! Cool!"

Danny rolled his eyes.

"More like butt squash pasta." Danny said, sticking out his tongue and making a face.

The girl on the video giggled, and he looked at her with a gleam in his eye.

"Give me my plate and get out." Matt said, not liking the idea of his girlfriend and Danny meeting each other just yet.

"Matt that was mean!" the girl said on the video.

"Yeah don't be mean." Danny said. "Aren't you going to introduce me to your friend?" He asked, flirting with her a little.

"She's not my friend, she's my girlfriend, and NO." Matt said.

"Pffftthaha!" Danny laughed out loud, remembering the gay porn magazine from earlier. "So you haven't told her yet?!" Danny asked, amazed.

"Told me what?" the girl asked.

Matt froze in total fear, thinking his brother Danny was going to talk about how he farted in his face this morning.

"So she doesn't KNOW?!" Danny asked, looking at his brother with total shock. "You shouldn't keep things like that a secret, I don't think it's healthy."

"You need to leave." Matt said, trying to sound tough. "Now."

"Keep what a secret!?" She said, getting more concerned.

"Wait..." Danny said, thinking about it. "So are YOU the one going to prom with him?" Danny asked the girl in the video.

The girl nodded.

"Are you SURE you want to go to prom with him? His mouth has been in some pretty questionable places...." Danny snickered.

"SHUT UP!" Matt yelled.

"What does he mean Matt? Like other girls?" She asked.

"No!! Worse!! I far---"

"GET OUT." Matt said, getting up.

"Fine, fine I'll go." Danny said.

"No wait, what did you mean by that?" The girl repeated.

"Leave then." Matt said with a threatening voice.

"Well before I do can I have 20 dollars for the new call of duty game? I'm short on cash and---"

"NO NOW GET THE HELL OUT MY ROOM!!" Matt said pushing his brother with all the strength he could muster, getting him past his doorway.

"Fine, fine I'll go." Danny said as he was being pushed away. "But I still think you should be true to yourse----"

Matt slammed the door in his face.

Danny overheard the girl's voice on the skype call again.

"Matt that was rude! I was talking to him!" She yelled. "Who was that?"

"Just my gay ass little brother." Matt said. "It's not important."

"I'M NOT GAY!!" Danny shouted from behind the door.

"Yeah, yeah, whatever. No one gives a shit. STOP LISTENING TO MY CONVERSATIONS AND GET LOST!!" Matt yelled back at him.

Danny walked off and his brother heard his footsteps as he left.

"So where were we?" Matt asked.

"Oh my god you're such an asshole! You kick your brother out while I'm talking to him, and you treat him like trash in front of me then ask 'where were we?' ugh." She said, frustration obvious in her voice.

"Sarah I---"

The girl's face disappeared from the video as she disconnected from it.

"Sarah...." Matt said, completely in shock.

BEEEP BEEEEP

"Matt what is it? I'm kind of busy." his friend asked with a bit of an attitude.

"I need your help on how to get her back!" Matt said.

"I mean...." Louis started. "I guess just call her?" He asked. "I don't know man...maybe now you'll have a use for that magazine you took from school, right?" Louis asked, laughing out loud.

"Are you talking about the gay one?!" Matt asked.

"Yeah."

"Hey fuck you man hahah!" Matt laughed, cheekily.

"No thank you, dude." Louis replied. "I have to go, man."

"Wait please. We have to talk about what happened!" Matt pleaded.

"Fine." Louis said. "So why did Sarah drop your call?" Louis asked.

"My brother came in the room and started talking about..umm....." Matt thought about it for a second. "He started lying about me and I got rude with him so she thought I was being an asshole."

"Well that's fucking annoying." Louis said sharply.

"So you think I should just call her back right?" Matt asked.

"Yeah just call her I guess. Dude look I REALLY have to go."

Matt was starting to find this kind of behavior suspicious. He was never pushed away like this before. Louis was his best friend. They may be in completely different cliques at school, and may have just met this year, but Louis was always kind to Matt. ALWAYS. He even helped set Matt up with Sarah. Matt trusted him like a brother. A real one, not like Danny.

"Why does it seem like you're trying to get rid of me?" Matt asked.

"Matt do you still have that gay porn magazine?" Louis asked.

"What? Why does that matter?" Matt asked.

"Just wondering. You still have it?" Louis asked.

"Yeah it's in my room." Matt said.

"Matt are you gay?" Louis asked.

"What!?" Matt's face lit up.

Why was his best friend asking him this. Fuck no he isn't gay.

"No? What the fuck. You GAVE me the magazine, remember? You said you found it and we laughed about it and the stuff in it. YOU said take it home."

"Yah..." Louis said. "But I didn't think you'd actually take it home... and then also keep it......" Louis said.

"But you told me to! WE'RE FRIENDS!" Matt said.

"Sarah told me you hadn't made a move on her yet, so I stole the magazine from a store to test ya." Louis said.

Matt could've sworn he heard some light snickering off in the distance, but he wasn't sure and he was too angry at his friend right now to tell.

"Test me?... Make a move, what?" Matt asked.

"Yeah she said you haven't once tried to fuck her. So I stole the magazine...you know, to test your reaction to it."

"I didn't have a reaction to it! I laughed at it WITH you!" Matt reacted.

"You took the magazine HOME with you, Matt." Louis said.

"Louis what are you saying? Dude, Louis I'm NOT gay. I haven't made a move because I've been waiting for after prom...." Matt said.

"You PROMISE you're not gay?" Louis asked again.

"I'm NOT gay, Louis. Dude of course I've wanted to bang Sarah. You SERIOUS? I just... I don't know..."

"Haha!" Louis laughed nervously. "That makes me feel SO much better."

Matt looked at him confused.

"I thought you liked me." Louis said.

"Hahahahahahahah!!" Matt laughed.

Louis started grinning. "Dude I'm so sorry. I just thought for a second there... that you might be..."

"No, no. Definitely not."

"Dude I owe you a HUGE apology." Louis said. "I've never hung out with anyone...like you...before." He said.

Matt understood what he meant. Louis was from a different clique than Matt at school and lived a completely different kind of life. They only started hanging out by chance, and Louis was always there when Matt needed him. Sometimes people would think their hanging out was weird, but Louis didn't care and Matt didn't either.

"Yeah I've never hung out with anyone like you, either." Matt said.

"Yup. We're pretty fucking rare individuals, right?" Louis asked, grinning.

"Hey why did your brother walk in your room anyway?" Louis asked, curious.

"He came in to give me my food, and then to beg me for cash for the new call of duty." Matt said.

"Hahahah he delivers your food FOR you!?" Louis asked. "Damn, I need a little brother."

Matt snorted. "It sucks. He's so damn annoying." He said.

"Haha I don't doubt it." Louis said.

"You know you've always been cool." Louis said. "I feel like such an ass now."

"No it's fine." Matt responded.

"Dude if this happened to my other friends they would be so pissed at me. You're different. That's why I like hanging around you. Look, I'll try to reach out to Sarah. Hear her side. Kind of play it your way, you know? I promise I'll do whatever I can. I'll just make sure she knows that you're just really nice and it's not that you don't want to fuck her, it's just that you're taking it slow and respect her. Trust me, Sarah isn't used to that."

Matt thought about asking Louis how he knew that, but then he realized he'd probably prefer not to hear the answer. If he found out that he was taking Louis' sloppy seconds, or that several of Louis' friend's had fucked Sarah in the past...that could drive a wedge between them or at least would make Matt extremely uncomfortable.

"Dude THANK YOU." Matt said. "I owe you BIG time."

"Hahaha no doubt, dude." Louis said, ending the skype call.

Matt smiled and then he saw a ... under Louis' chat indicating he was typing.

He got a message that read; "Now quit being so gay for me and throw our favorite homo porn mag away. I'll get you a different one later, babe. 😉"

Matt smiled.

He turned around to do that, but was distracted when he heard his phone go off. It was a message from Sarah.

"Babe I'm so sorry. I'm talking to Louis right now and he's explaining everything. I think you're so sweet. Can you ever forgive me?"

Matt looked down at his phone and was so thrilled. First he sent a message to Louis saying

'OMG TY.'

Then he replied to Sarah with a heartfelt message, completely forgetting to throw the magazine in the trash.

Danny's gaze turned toward a carefully and purposefully wrapped gift that he had placed on his desk moments ago. He sighed. It was rare of him to get viewer mail, and he knew that putting his address down on one of his recent videos would come back to haunt him, he just could never have guessed how.

He snorted a bit, remembering the last bit of fan mail he had opened up before he edited his address out of the video. Someone from California had requested a pair of his underwear be mailed to them. He comforted himself thinking that it was some female fan of his, wanting to own a pair of his underwear because of her feminine desires. That was more comforting than the alternative at least, which Danny knew was the truth: that some freak faggy rando in California wanted to sniff his shorts.

Although disturbing, Danny still found that alternative pretty damn funny. What kind of man wants to actually sniff another's boxers?

Shrugging to himself and finally overcoming his ADD he looked down at the gift before him and pawed at it for a minute, enjoying the game of trying to figure out what it was before actually opening it.

It was solid, square, heavy, and felt expensive.

Danny began to wonder if his California friend sent him several wrapped stacks of cash out of gratitude. Excited, Danny tore the packaging open.

He looked down at his gift with dismay.

"Really? Some stupid book?" Danny said out-loud.

He examined it some more. The book was more of a tome, dusty and ancient looking. The front cover had some kind of ancient writing on it that he could not recognize, and he began to wonder if this was all some kind of joke being played on him.

"If it is, this isn't very funny." He said, speaking to only himself.

He noticed a card behind the book, and opened it up. Inside was a hand written message.

"To the funniest, cutest..." Danny gagged at this line, knowing it was a guy sending him this gift.

"Cutest? I wear a mask for god sakes." Danny muttered.

"...and best YouTuber ever. You deserve everything this book has to offer you, and more. I wish you would use it on me. If you do decide to use it please send me a personal video. Or message me? Please? Your Biggest Fan - Jesterforpres46"

"I deserve everything this book has to offer? Sooooooooooo.... nothing?" Danny chuckled to himself.

He noticed that his fan had specifically created a YouTube account for him only. "Jesterforpres" Jester for President? This was the first time he saw a fan so committed that they would create an account specifically dedicated to him. He decided maybe he could at least GLANCE at what was inside the book.

He opened the first page and saw a bunch of the ancient writing again. Underneath it was a small line written in english.

"Be warned: This book was passed down for a millennia by powerful men. Cruel Kings and those sacrificed to them, ritualists and those devoted to one. This book can either fulfill your wildish wishes or worst nightmares. Should this book fall into the wrong hands: one who is envious, one who is impure, or one who is immature... a powerful enemy shall that person become. A God to anyone bound by the book. Be wary, they who allow this book to fall into their enemies hands: for once bound to the power of the book, anything is possible. Be cautious, they who have the power to give the book away to any man."

Danny rolled his eyes and flipped the page once more. He saw an index that seemed written by the same person who sent him the letter.

1. The Binding Ritual
2. Shrinking
3. Transformation
4. Mind Control
5. Dream Control
6. Sensory Control
7. Full Control
8. The Unbinding

Curious, he flipped the page and saw a summation of each.

Binding Ritual - Repeat these words and the name of the ritualist or human sacrifice to bind them to the power of the book and he who holds it.

Shrinking - They who are bound are subject to size transmogrification.

"Pffft." Danny snorted. "What the fuck is this?" He asked out-loud as he continued skimming. "This is a bunch of bull."

He skimmed quickly.

Transformation - They who are bound are subject to morph into any object.


Mind Control - They who are bound are controlled by he who holds the book.

"Blah, blah, blah." Danny said, reading the last few parts.

Dream Control - They who are bound are subject to dream manipulation by he who holds the book. Additionally, he who holds the book may enter the ritualist's or sacrifice's dream where entire worlds can be created or destroyed, and every environment can be controlled by he who has the power. Anything is possible in a dream or a nightmare.

Sensory Control - They who are bound are subject to inconceivable sensory manipulations. Heightened sense of smell, hearing, sight, taste, or touch

Full Control - They who are bound are subject to the whim of the book and he who holds it completely in any and all aspect imaginable.

"So If I'm reading this right.... I can control someone? Just read a passage? Say a name?? Ok fine."

Danny flips to the Binding Ritual and begins to speak what he believes is written. Some helpful pronunciations were jotted down by the same person who wrote his letter.

"Nīṅkaḷ atikārattiṟku kaṭṭuppaṭṭirukkiṟīrkaḷ. Nīṅkaḷ viruppattiṟku uṭpaṭṭavarkaḷ. Iṇaṅku. Matt."

Translated: 'You are bound to the power. You are subject to the whim. Succumb. ______ Name'

A blazing blue light enveloped the room. Frightened, Danny dropped the book on the floor.

"What the fuck!?" He said. "That was so fucking cool!"

It took him a moment, and then he realized.

"Wait a minute, is this real? Is this real magic?!"

Danny grabbed the book and quietly wandered into his brother's room. He saw Matt sleeping soundly in front of him and flipped to which page?

info.brief_description: Danny's playful antics drive his older brother Matthew mad! You decide how he reacts.
info.description:
Description:

Most people find their younger siblings to be annoyances, but Matthew Hunter is a special case. His younger brother Daniel is actually one of the biggest brats to ever walk the face of the earth.
Daniel is a rebellious teenager who spends most of his time pranking his friends, and especially his older brother Matthew. When he's not out at the skate park laying down some sick tricks he's at home annoying his geeky older brother in some way or uploading one of his prank videos to YouTube.

You name the prank, chances are Danny has done it.

Well one day, one of Danny's harmless pranks takes a bad turn...and causes a cascading series of unfortunate events to happen to poor Matthew.

Will he finally be able to escape his annoying younger brother? Or will Daniel's pranks truly ruin his life?

Note to anyone wishing to add a chapter:
